reviewText:
In the cult tradition of SPARTACUS, the halls of every science department now echoes: "I AM SHELDON"!

Well into its third season, THE BIG BANG THEORY proved to be one of the most funny TV sitcoms ever aired. I had not laughed out loud this hard ever since the best days of FRASIER and SEINFELD - and BIG BANG is consistently brilliant!

Sheldon Cooper is unavoidably the king of the show - the massive black hole this Universe revolves around if you will. A child prodigy, now a 24 years old theoretical physicist PhD with absolutely no social skills or known sexual drive. Sheldon may be on the verge of unifying the fields but cannot drive a car to save his life or break a smile even remotely resembling that of a mere homo sapiens.
Best SEASON 3 moment (a very hard choice to make): attempting to condition Penny using positive reinforcement (chocolates) - but was also open to "mild electric-shocks with almost imperceptible tissue damage" to have her ready by dinner-time.

Leonard Hofstadter is Sheldon's roommate and primary ...keeper. An experimental physicist himself, he juggles Sheldon's idiosyncrasies with his personal neurosis - not to mention his crush on his neighbor Penny.
Best SEASON 3 moment: getting high on hash-cookies while on an asteroid-gazing camp-trip and rambling that he 'd rather have a different name as Leonard sounds like having "nerd" in it.

Howard Wolowitz is the only one with no PhD yet (and Sheldon never lets him forget it). An electrical engineer whose crowning achievement is a mechanized arm that is used in the space shuttle (and is now working on its liquid waste management solutions). The fact that he is a short man with a severely outdated and misguided sense of fashion, still lives with his mother, insists on using a collection of pickup lines straight from men's magazines advice columns - and yet carries himself as God's gift to women is just hilarious.
Best SEASON 3 moment: turning into Gothowitz by use of fake tattoo-sleeves to pick up "easy morbid Goth girls".

Rajesh Koothrappali is a particle astrophysicist with a fashion sense close to absolute zero and a severe case of shyness - to the point that he cannot speak in front of women unless inebriated. He keeps using the "poor Indian" defense although his father is a rich doctor who drives a Bentley.
Best SEASON 3 moment: wearing a T-shirt with a small speaker and a large selection of sound-effects, he uses it brilliantly to dramatize his answers. HOWARD: "But Sheldon, you ARE guilty". RAJEH: "[playing the Law & Order Doom-DOOM]!"

Finally, Penny. She is the proverbial good girl next door who came to California with stardom aspirations but so far works as waitress and suffers a sequence of bad boyfriends - and from her neighbors.
Best SEASON 3 moment: waiting at the hospital with Sheldon taking her medical history. "Migraines?" "Well, I'm getting one now!"

The show unavoidably makes use of previous sitcom combinations (the odd couple, the unfulfilled love-interest mismatch) but even if one manages to discern them they are used in such a fresh manner that all that is left is great entertainment!

The way to truly enjoy this is to own it on DVD. The writing is so smart and the jokes fly so fast (many of them non-verbal) there is just no way to savor it during its weekly air time. Well, may be Sheldon could but then again, who can compare his intellect with his?

HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

When I saw the premiere of this show, I laughed hysterically but thought, will it appeal to a broad audience?  Clearly, it has.  As time has gone on, the character development has been great, and the writing is consistently good.  As a professional physicist, I am also intrigued by the accuracy of the science.  I have recommended the show to many non-scientists, and most have become hooked.  It is great to have the DVD with commercial-free episodes.

I love this show because I think it shows how these guys may not fit in with what we perceive as "Normal" in society, but they are so cool in their own right.  Sheldon reminds me a little bit of one of my nephews, and I think it's awesome to have a show that says "Yeah we don't fit in everywhere, but it's okay to be us".  Funny funny show.

I love this series..I own every episode on DVD and hope to have all seasons on Blu-ray when available. I can relate to these "nerds", no i don't own all that stuff they have but the at one time I did own alot of comics, figures , etc. At this time I do own some of those things but not in grand stature that they do. No I'm not a physicist (wish i was i hate my job). if you never has seen this show your missing out.
We laugh hysterically thru each and every episode.  We're in our late 30s and feel like kids again when we watch this.  Awesome series!!
Good TV, Actors and material getting old. No new plots
I love the big bang theory, came fast in pristine condition.
what can I say, I love BBT
Love all the Big Bang shows!
It is the big Bang so may hours of enjoyment

I just don't get this show, i have tried but it is just not for me
This came with 3 discs of 4 episodes. Disc 1 is episode 1-4, disc 2 is episode 9-12, disc 3 is episode 17-20. It's missing half the season.

This was only one episode, In which Sheldon goes to traffic court. Want an evaluation? Okay. Parsons is funny as hell, as usual;  everyone else is funny, too. Except Kaley Kuoco, who is funny and beautiful, and, such as it is, the ONLY real reason to watch the show...sammy
Big Bang Theory Season 3 was hilarious. I watched it all in two days.
love the show and love the price
Love. This. Series. Honestly, The Big Bang Theory is amazing and will not disappoint!! Highly recommend this! Quality of the actual product is perfect and just as expected.
A great laugh, each episode and the cast are extremely funny and it is cool that they don't curse. Good clean series.
Can't get enough of the show. The cast is great. Really enjoy the stories they tell
Well it's what I purchased and it works.
Prompt delivery.  The packaging was good.  I wish I had purchased the blu-ray with the digital copy, but $10 for a full season is pretty rad.
I don't have cable anymore so I made sure to buy all of these on DVD so that I could continue to love this show without the $100 cable bill!!! Lol
one of the best seasons (if not the best). The writing was at it's peak, and the references were clever. I consider this to be the pinnacle season of the series.
A ton of laughs for our inner nerds!
I don't watch much TV, so I was late to the party on this one. However, it's become one of my favorites and I've bought and watched everything up to the current season. Great cast, writing.
Doesn't play. No scratches just refuses to play in any of the 3 dvd players we have.
Excellent.  Arrived quickly and well packaged.  Exactly as described.
Love the show! Love the cds!
had a small problem with one DVD , but otherwise good deal, good transaction, arrived in very timely manner
Love this sitcom. So funny and is great when you need a break from life to just chill and laugh!
I love this show it is my go-to comedy for my blue days

I am continually enjoying the show. I know the show is out in it's tenth season currently, but never gave it much time before now, and I do enjoy it very much. Although not a family show (too much sex and talk about sex for any young persons that don't understand that casual sex with random people is not something everyone does), it is fun to watch with the wife after the kids go to bed.
i was so happy i recieved this relatively quickly. The blu-ray's were excellent, the case was flawless.
The show is awesome! The different characters play well of each other making it witty with great plots. Can't get enough!
I love The Big Bang Theory, any year or episode. When I am having an icky, sad or even stressful day or time the show makes me laugh. Laughter is the best medicine.
I always knew nerds could be funny, but not for this long. If Sheldon and Amy get married, we are looking at a new sit com chapion
Love this show. Love the dry humor.
Purchased to replace the original one I bought and loaned and never saw again ! ! !
Christmas gift for lots of laughs
Love the show.  Can watch it many times and always find something that is funny.
I love this show!  The jokes are intelligent and the characters are just exaggerated enough to be quirky but believable.
I have seen these episodes over and over and I still laugh!!
Love BBT happy, silly funny show, 3rd season is one of the best. We could all use a laugh these days.
Arrived 1 day late.  But I love the series and will enjoy watching it over and over.
My wife still loves the show. got it just in time for Christmas.
Third season one of the best. I'm disappointed with the new seasons, but the first 5 were great.
We love Big Bang theory and Amazon is the only place I can find all the series
This is such a funny show!  I came in late and had to go back and watch the rest of the seasons!  I'm glad I did!  :)
The Big Bang Gang continues into the third season with good doses of humor. I still laugh, even though this is an old season.

This is my favorite TV series. SO FUNNY, touching, covers wide level of real human relationship issues/challenges with geeky guys.
Great connection of all of the characters. Just a joy to watch.

I love the Big Bang Theory. I got all 8 seasons of these and will be buying Season 9 when it comes out. No scratches, and they all played well. It was nice to be able to order them all and get them all in the same spot since I live in a small town and can only buy the two latest seasons at my local walmart.
This show is great. Cast and writers seem to be synced in knowing the characters that we know and love; and the reason it continues to be my favorite show.
Would give more stars if I could!
no problems with product or packaging

I started watching this by accident and then I got hooked. I am amazed at the amount of information they have to memorize and they do a great job.  Its very funny and a nice change from some of the ridiculous comedy shows.
loves the show and is just what she asked for
No problems. Item received as described. Thank you.
Simply the best show on TV. This may be the best season, but too close to call, they are all so good.
Love this show and can watch it every day. I know I could watch it on demand but the blu-rays come with great extras that are as enjoyable to watch as the sitcom episodes.

Season 3 so far is probably My favorite out of the 11. I really wish they would have pursued hooking up Sheldon with Martha, although that would have probably killed Amy and Sheldon later. After watching Young Sheldon, I get that part also. Sheldon is a 40 year work in progress to get to the Amy/Sheldon Corbomite Maneuver. There are such a copius plethorah of hilarious moments in Season 3 that I find myself returning to watch Season 2 in anticipation of 3, then cruise on into 3 with total enjoyment.
Quality DVD series. Great addition to build the whole set.
There is not a single thing in the show I do not like!
Bought this as a replacement. Last dvd was scratched and won't play.
Turn's out to be an interesting series
